QuestData.Title: Daelin's Men
QuestData.Description: Reddon... Redpath... Ah, here it is! Lieutenant Paval Reethe.$b$bJoined the Theramore guard along with most of the recruits that came across the sea with Lady Proudmoore. Enlisted with the marines of Kul Tiras at the age of sixteen. Distinguished service, promotions...$b$bListed as missing.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return the information about Reethe to Captain Garran Vimes in Theramore.
QuestData.RewardText: Missing? That would be Tesoran's kind way of saying traitor.$b$bNo doubt he's one of those fools so blindly loyal to Admiral Daelin that he turned traitor. Isn't that a delicious irony? The deserters accuse us of betraying the Alliance.
